Key.English: Terrain detail affects the quality of the ground and how far grass is rendered. Lower quality means less vertices are used for terrain rendering, making distant hills less smooth.
View distance affects how far you can see. Note that this does not affect object view distance (you can change that in your Arma 3 settings).
Login to the Mars editor. You will either have to be the first person to login (if allowed by server), or have a whitelisted Steam account on this server.
